casebody.data:
Lottie SOCOLOV, as Guardian ad Litem of Edward L. Berger, an Incompetent Person, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 109. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 3, 1934. Gazan & Caldwell, of New York City, for appellant. Leo J. Hickey, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., Tompkins, Boal & Tompkins, of New York City (Arthur M. Boal, of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (6 F. Supp. 916) affirmed.
